mapper.select: SELECT R.RESERVATION_NO, R.HOUSE_NO, R.CONTENT, R.RESERVATION_DATE, R.RESERVATION_TIME, R.DEPOSIT, R.RESULT, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NAME, H.TITLE FROM RESERVATION R, MEMBER M, HOUSE H WHERE R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO AND R.HOUSE_NO = H.HOUSE_NO AND ${identifier} = #{userNo} ORDER BY RESERVATION_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION (RESERVATION_NO, MEMBER_NO, AGENT_NO, HOUSE_NO, RESERVATION_DATE, RESERVATION_TIME, CONTENT, RESULT, DEPOSIT, CREATE_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_RES.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, #{agentNo}, #{houseNo}, #{reservationDate}, #{reservationTime}, #{content}, '방문 대기', '결제 완료', SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT R.RESERVATION_NO, TO_CHAR(RESERVATION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "RESERVATION_DATE", R.MEMBER_NO, R.RESERVATION_TIME, R.AGENT_NO, HOUSE_NO, RESULT, DEPOSIT, A.AGENT_NAME, NVL(RE.REVIEW_NO, 0) AS REVIEW_NO FROM RESERVATION R LEFT JOIN AGENT A ON (R.AGENT_NO = A.AGENT_NO) LEFT JOIN REVIEW RE ON (R.RESERVATION_NO = RE.RESERVATION_NO) WHERE R.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY RESERVATION_DATE DESC

SELECT RESERVATION_NO, TO_CHAR(RESERVATION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "RESERVATION_DATE", CONTENT, RESERVATION_TIME, R.AGENT_NO, HOUSE_NO, RESULT, DEPOSIT, A.AGENT_NAME, CID, TID, CANCEL_AMOUNT, CANCEL_TAX_FREE_AMOUNT FROM RESERVATION R, AGENT A WHERE RESERVATION_NO = #{reservationNo} AND R.AGENT_NO = A.AGENT_NO
SELECT RESERVATION_NO FROM (SELECT * FROM RESERVATION WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY RESERVATION_NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVATION SET CID = 'TC0ONETIME', TID = #{tid}, CANCEL_AMOUNT = 20000, CANCEL_TAX_FREE_AMOUNT = 1800 WHERE RESERVATION_NO = #{reservationNo}
